channel.description:
[SIZE=5][CENTER][FONT=Impact]Links:[/FONT] [FONT=Impact]Client Download:[/FONT] [url=http://goliath-ps.com/archive/downloads/Goliath.jar]Goliath .jar Client[/url] [FONT=Impact]Main Website:[/FONT] [url=http://goliath-ps.com/index.php]Goliath RsPs - Best RuneScape Private Server 2015[/url] [FONT=Impact]Forums:[/FONT] [url=http://goliath-ps.com/forum/]Goliath[/url] [FONT=Impact]Hiscores:[/FONT] [url=http://goliath-ps.com/hiscores/]Goliath RsPs - Hiscores[/url] [/SIZE] [SPOILER=Update Log][B]Updates:[/B] The practically pointless 'special attack' orb in the client, now displays a world map button. We're working on the world map feature. Removed the Ruse client background, modified it as Goliath's own background. Decreased the horrible client CPU usage, for whatever reason it was high, sometimes using 100% CPU. Added our custom updater to the client. Modifying teleports and other locations, adding new maps soon. Client security enhanced which fixed the use of Cheat Engine, you can no longer edit the client variables such as your height level, coordinates, etc.
[i]Read more updates: [url=http://goliath-ps.com/forum/index.php?/forum/7-goliath-updates/]Goliath Update Logs[/url] [/i] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Features]We plan on adding what the players suggest! You can post your suggestions under the [URL=http://goliath-ps.com/forum/index.php?/forum/11-suggestions/]Suggestions Board[/URL]
[B]Features:[/B] Loyalty Points - Titles Loyalty Points - Cosmetic's Shop Bank Tabs Bounty Hunter Ironman Mode Ultimate Ironman Mode Well of Goodwill Automatic Voting Rewards Automatic Donations Clan Chats Full Gambling Working Dungeons Runespan Up 24 hours, 7 days a week. Double XP if Well of Goodwill is filled. 0 Dupes Dungeoneering Skill 100% Shooting Stars you can mine.
[B]Bosses:[/B] God Wars Dungeon Nex Corporeal Beast Tormented Demons Dagannoth Kings Slash Bash Nomad Pheonix Bandos Avatar Kalphite Queen King Black Dragon Chaos Elemental Frost Dragons Glacors
[B]Minigames:[/B] Warriors Guild Pest Control Duel Arena Barrows Fight Cave Fight Pits Soul Wars [/SPOILER]

item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

[SIZE=5][CENTER][FONT=Impact]Links:[/FONT]
[FONT=Impact]Client Download:[/FONT] Goliath .jar Client
[FONT=Impact]Main Website:[/FONT] Goliath RsPs - Best RuneScape Private Server 2015
[FONT=Impact]Forums:[/FONT] Goliath
[FONT=Impact]Hiscores:[/FONT] Goliath RsPs - Hiscores
[/SIZE]
[SPOILER=Update Log][B]Updates:[/B]
The practically pointless ‘special attack’ orb in the client, now displays a world map button. We’re working on the world map feature.
Removed the Ruse client background, modified it as Goliath’s own background.
Decreased the horrible client CPU usage, for whatever reason it was high, sometimes using 100% CPU.
Added our custom updater to the client.
Modifying teleports and other locations, adding new maps soon.
Client security enhanced which fixed the use of Cheat Engine, you can no longer edit the client variables such as your height level, coordinates, etc.

Read more updates: Goliath Update Logs
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Features]We plan on adding what the players suggest! You can post your suggestions under the [URL=http://goliath-ps.com/forum/index.php?/forum/11-suggestions/]Suggestions Board[/URL]

[B]Features:[/B]
Loyalty Points - Titles
Loyalty Points - Cosmetic’s Shop
Bank Tabs
Bounty Hunter
Ironman Mode
Ultimate Ironman Mode
Well of Goodwill
Automatic Voting Rewards
Automatic Donations
Clan Chats
Full Gambling
Working Dungeons
Runespan
Up 24 hours, 7 days a week.
Double XP if Well of Goodwill is filled.
0 Dupes
Dungeoneering Skill 100%
Shooting Stars you can mine.

[B]Bosses:[/B]
God Wars Dungeon
Nex
Corporeal Beast
Tormented Demons
Dagannoth Kings
Slash Bash
Nomad
Pheonix
Bandos Avatar
Kalphite Queen
King Black Dragon
Chaos Elemental
Frost Dragons
Glacors

[B]Minigames:[/B]
Warriors Guild
Pest Control
Duel Arena
Barrows
Fight Cave
Fight Pits
Soul Wars
[/SPOILER]
